title: African peach and chicken tagine
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, diced', '3 to 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 tablespoon finely grated root ginger', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '4 to 5 South African peaches - peeled, stoned and sliced', '1 small sweet potato, cut into small bite-size pieces', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '125ml water', '75g Kalamata olives, pitted', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '50g raisins', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '400g to 500g cooked couscous or rice, to serve', '2 tablespoons pine nuts, toasted', 'chopped fresh coriander, to taste']
